plot: A police shooting in outer-borough Queens is examined from three distinct points of view- the deceased's best friend, a waitress in a club who interacted with all parties involved, and the police officer who fires the fatal shots.
title: Allen Mack
plot_es: A police shooting in outer-borough Queens is examined from three distinct points of view- the deceased's best friend, a waitress in a club who interacted with all parties involved, and the police officer who fires the fatal shots.
